titleInfo.title: Map of area along Bayou Sara Road, upper East Baton Rouge Parish : background.

mods.abstract: Incomplete, undated cadastral map of an area along both sides of the Bayou Sara Road between the northern portion of East Baton Rouge Parish and East Feliciana Parish. Bounded on the south by the Mississippi River, and on the northwest by Devil's Swamp. Includes names of current and some previous landowners. Table of bearing trees on left-hand portion of map. Upper right portion of map missing. Map extremely faded with age; much of text is illegible. Listing of bearing trees on left-hand portion of map. Scale not determined.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Access to unprocessed collections requires the permission of the curator, subject to Special Collectionsâ€™ Policy on Access to Unprocessed Collections (http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/about/unprocessed.html)
mods.note: William Waller Survey Collection, Mss. 3592, 3910, 4326, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
